Package com.notonthehighstreet.promotion

Class BulkDiscountRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.notonthehighstreet.promotion.AbstractPromotionRule
      • com.notonthehighstreet.promotion.BulkDiscountRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PromotionRule
    public class BulkDiscountRule
extends AbstractPromotionRule
    BulkDiscountRule class is the implementation class of PromotionRule. This class defines the bulk discount rule of spending over the minimum amount Â£ (minAmount), and getting a predefined % (discount) off. By providing different parameters to the constructor, it can handling different kind of bulk discounts. e.g. 1) new BulkDiscountRule(0, 10) means "10% off for all items" 2) new BulkDiscountRule(100, 20) means "20% off when purchase over Â£100"
